short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The chrome side panel for HomeAssistant

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Persistent side-panel in chrome. Keep your HomeAssistant dashboard visible while you continue browsing.

Point to any dashboard or create one in HomeAssisstant just for this extension. Fully customisable.

At first, the extension uses the default URL: http://homeassistant.local:8123 to connect to your instance. If this fails then you will be shown the config screen to set your URL.
URL can be configured anytime by accessing the extension options.

Note:
You must set use_x_frame_options to false in your HomeAssistant's configuration.yaml

http:
    use_x_frame_options: false
